page.title: 08INDUSTRY HINTON ON GREEN
page.content: {TYPES OF INDUSTRY}-there are four industries at Hinton on the Green which are a county transport depot ,a furniture maker ,farm machinery and fish and chicken processing. {FISH AND CHICKEN FIRM}-at this firm they process, distribute, store, package. Their output is 70 tonnes a week. The plant used includes breadcrumbing machines ,smoking kiln , frying machines, mixers and weighing machines.They have room to store 700 tonnes of fish from world wide sources which is stored in the refrigerator room. They print booklets of wholesale prices for 32000 housewives who order in bulk over six weeks. The process is completely computerised. {HEREFORD&WORCESTER CC DEPOT}-Here they keep road materials like salt, signs etc.30 people work there.
